main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported over Charlestown, West Virginia in the early 1950s.
interesting points: A cigar-shaped object hovered for about 15 minutes on January 27, 1955, emitting bright light., The object was reported to be approximately 100 feet long before it disappeared suddenly., An amateur astronomer photographed a round luminous object near the moon from Broadway, Virginia., A retired city police officer witnessed a bright disc-like object moving across the sky on April 7, 1955., Investigating officers confirmed the sighting with other independent witnesses in the area.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object and round luminous object
witness description: Retired city police officer and other independent witnesses
